wikipedia_page.main: Robert Barr (1865 – 1935) was a Scottish footballer who played in the Football League for Bury, Preston North End and Stoke.

response: Robert Barr or Bob Barr may refer to:
* Bob Barr (1880s pitcher) (Robert M. Barr, 1856–1930), Major League Baseball pitcher
* Bob Barr (1930s pitcher) (Robert A. Barr, 1908–2002), baseball pitcher for the Brooklyn Dodgers
* Bob Barr (Robert L. Barr, Jr., born 1948),  American attorney and 2008 Libertarian Party candidate for President of the United States
